name: Russian Anime
description:
What should anime look like in Russia? The only way. Your task is to prove that your style is the best in the area.
Your enemies are anime girls who have broken up into groups throughout the area. They guard the items of clothing you don't like. Kill them, for this you have 6 types of various weapons, but it's not so simple, because they are also armed. Kill everyone and destroy all clothing items scattered around the map for victory.

  • 1 beautiful map
  • 6 types of weapons
  • Advanced AI
